participant_1.background:
I moved to the mountains to be closer to my mom and to enjoy skiing.
i read sci fi space adventures with a passion.
i like wide , open spaces.
I just finished painting my nails.
My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a home with a big yard for my pets to play in and a kitchen where I can cook my favorite Mexican food.
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
i really enjoy making friends.
i take care of my mother and father.
I enjoy spending time outdoors, especially on my property.

content.text: Hey there!
Hola, cómo estás?
I'm doing good, thanks! How about you?
I am doing well too, thank you for asking.
I just finished painting my nails. What are you up to?
I just celebrated my birthday with friends and family.
Oh, happy birthday! That's sounds like a fun time.
Thanks! It was a lot of fun.
What did you do for your birthday?
We had pizza and cake, and then we hung out.
That sounds like a great time. I'm glad you had fun.
Thanks! I'm glad you're doing well.
Thanks! I'm enjoying living in the mountains.
That sounds nice. I'm looking for a home with a big yard for my pets to play in.
I love wide, open spaces. That would be a great place to live.
I think so too. I also enjoy spending time outdoors.
Me too. I love hiking and camping.
Those are great hobbies. I love to cook, especially Mexican food.
I love Mexican food too! I'm not a very good cook, but I love to eat it.
I'm sure you're a great cook. I'm sure your pets love when you cook for them.
They do! They always get excited when they see me come home from work.
I can imagine. They're lucky to have you.
Thanks! I'm glad they're my pets
